import React from "react" import "./Login.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class Login extends React.Component { state={ uid:"", name:"", email:"", password:"", currentView:"" } constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { uid:"", name:"", email:"", password:"", currentView: "signUp" } } Loggedin=()=>{ } changeView = (view) => { this.setState({ uid:this.state.uid, name:this.state.name, email:this.state.email, password:this.state.password, currentView: view }) } setUserName =(el)=>{ this.setState({ uid:this.state.uid, name:el, email:this.state.email, password:this.state.password, currentView: this.state.currentView }) } setEmail =(el)=>{ this.setState({ uid:this.state.uid, name:this.state.name, email:el, password:this.state.password, currentView: this.state.currentView }) } setPassword=(el)=>{ this.setState({ uid:this.state.uid, name:this.state.name, email:this.state.email, password:el, currentView: this.state.currentView }) } currentView = () => { switch(this.state.currentView) { case "signUp": return (

Sign Up!

Create Account
  • this.setUserName(el)} required/>
  • this.setEmail(el)} required/>
  • this.setPassword(el)} required/>
) break case "logIn": return (

Welcome Back!

Log In
  • this.setEmail(el)} required/>
  • this.setPassword(el)} required/>
  • this.changeView("PWReset")} href="#">Forgot Password?
) break case "PWReset": return (

Reset Password

Password Reset
  • A reset link will be sent to your inbox!
) default: break } } render() { return (
{this.currentView()}
) } } export default Login;
